page.title: 16DOCTORS' SURGERY
page.content: The new doctors' surgery in Lower Lane was built on the site of an old Congregational Church and was completed in 1981. There are{five {doctors}in the practice (all with their own room) and other staff including three{district nurses,}a district{midwife,}two{health visitors, as well as several receptionists. Patients live within a{five mile {radius}of Bishops Waltham. The doctors work in the surgery and go out to calls on a rota system. Nowadays there is an{appointment system}at the surgery and usually patients can be seen by one of the doctors the same day they ring in. Various{clinics}are held there such as the Ante-natal Clinic.
